name: Mproject
tagline: A web project about the story of Madagascar through photography, videos and
body:
### Welcome to `mProject`.
This is a collaborative project which goal is to visually tell the history of Madagascar Island through pictures and interactivity. Visual content is one of the most universal content that can reach different cultures no matter the education level. I decided to launch this project as my first collaborative project so people around the world know where we Malagasy people come from.
Ceci est un projet collaboratif dont le but est de raconter l'histoire de l'île de Madagascar à travers les images et l'interactivité. De nos jours, le contenu visuel est l'une des voie de communications les plus universelles, transcendant ainsi les differentes cultures sans tenir compte du niveau d'éducation.

### Collaborators
If you prefer to not use the automatic generator, push a branch named `gh-pages` to your repository to create a page manually. In addition to supporting regular HTML content, GitHub Pages support Jekyll, a simple, blog aware static site generator. Jekyll makes it easy to create site-wide headers and footers without having to copy them across every page. It also offers intelligent blog support and other advanced templating features.

### Authors and Contributors
@novapixels ...for now
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
